Product: Voltas Beko DT8S Free Standing 8 Place Settings Dishwasher
Review_Summary: After using 1 and half months I can definitely say that it is a good budget dishwasher.My family members prefers clean & shine(35 min run time) mode as it gives a shiny look to the utensils and 35 min is quite a less time then the others. On other hand rest of the modes also works pretty well but kind of shiny layer is missing after the wash and as said 'greasy,heavily oiled & burnt utensils needs to be pre wash by hand' before you go for the wash.
